entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
